game.name: Spam Runner 2
game.shortDescription: A Unique Mix of Adventure and Platforming as you explore worlds filled with time trial challenges, unlock new skills, talk to goofy characters, and race your way to the top of leaderboards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Unique Mix of Adventure and Platforming as you explore worlds filled with time trial challenges, unlock new skills, talk to goofy characters, and race your way to the top of leaderboards.
